      • setQubit

        public void setQubit(int index,
            boolean value)
        Set a specific qubit to either 1 or 0. We first measure the qubit. If it's what we want it to be, leave it unchanged, otherwise flip it.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the qubit we're trying to set
        value - value of this qubit (true = 1, false = 0)
